title: Medium helmet

properties.name: description
properties.value: A Medium helmet is armour worn in the headwear slot. Although full helmets are stronger than medium helmets, players training magic and ranging would have no trouble seeing through a medium helmet, giving them better accuracy whilst still having good defences against melee and ranged. Notably, they do not have a negative range accuracy bonus like full helmets.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:HelmThe RuneScape Classic Wiki also has an article on: classicrsw:Medium Helmets
See also: Full helmet
Medium helmet
SlotHelmet slot
TypeMelee

A Medium helmet is armour worn in the headwear slot. Although full helmets are stronger than medium helmets, players training magic and ranging would have no trouble seeing through a medium helmet, giving them better accuracy whilst still having good defences against melee and ranged. Notably, they do not have a negative range accuracy bonus like full helmets.
